amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to shorten the timetable to file a petition for judicial review of a permit, license, or approval of a major infrastructure project, such as a highway or public transit project, from 150 days to 90 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
